message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you given its features and your needs.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint. Can you meet me at $12,000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is quite a bit below my minimum. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about we meet at $12,500? I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
